telephony_alias_termination_warning: The number will be cancelled on {{date}}.
telephony_alias_termination_warning_canc: You can cancel in the next section.
telephony_alias_convert_warning: The number will be converted online on {{date}}.
telephony_alias_load_error: Oops! An error has occurred loading your number.
telephony_alias_presentation_part_one: Un numéro, aussi appelé alias, est virtuel. À l’inverse d’une ligne téléphonique, il ne dispose d’aucun forfait d’appel ni d'aucun matériel.
telephony_alias_presentation_part_two: Ce numéro est souvent votre premier moyen de contact avec le client, voire la carte de visite de votre entreprise. Il vous permet de mettre en place votre propre stratégie d'appels.
telephony_alias_presentation_part_one: A number, also known as an alias, is virtual. Unlike a telephone line, it does not have a call plan or any hardware.
telephony_alias_presentation_part_two: This number is often your first means of contact with the customer, as it is listed on your company's business card. It allows you to set up your own call strategy.
telephony_alias_presentation_part_three: Once you have ordered or ported it to OVHcloud, you can assign a role to it, depending on your needs: simple redirection, a call queue, an interactive multi-choice voice server, or even a conference call.
telephony_alias_configuration_configurat: Interactive Voice Server (expert mode) in VXML
telephony_alias_configuration_delete_con: Are you sure you want to delete your configuration?
You will lose any settings you have defined.
telephony_alias_delete_ko: An error has occurred deleting the configuration.
telephony_alias_consumption_incoming_cal: Calls received during the current month
telephony_alias_consumption_outgoing_cal: Calls made during the current month
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_cont: With the expert mode of Contact Centre Solution, you can manage the flow of your calls from end to end. Choose your own strategy, depending on the calling numbers and time slots. Play welcome tones, customise your on-hold music, and ring the phones for your different services.
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_clou: With the Expert Call Queue, you can manage your communication flow more comprehensively. Play a welcome sound, customise your waiting music and ring the phones of your different services according to the strategies you define, on selected time slots. You can specify the maximum number of callers in the queue, and their maximum wait time. This solution is in the beta testing phase.
telephony_alias_config_feature_type_svi: The VXML Interactive Voice Response allows you to use an advanced interactive menu via a 2.1 configuration. The caller is invited, via pre-recorded messages or a speech summary, to interact with the server using the keys on their phone. Depending on the configuration you have chosen, they can play sounds or transfer a call to other numbers. Please note that only transfers to OVHcloud numbers are possible.

Please note that this configuration will soon be permanently replaced by the Call queue configuration.
